Hello everyone! My name is Jiaxin Zhang (Jessie), and I’m currently pursuing a Master of Data Science at the University of British Columbia. With both a strong foundation and hands-on experience in business analytics area, I’ve developed a deep passion for using data to drive impactful decisions. Throughout my career, I’ve worked extensively with tools such as Python, R, and SQL to transform raw data into actionable insights, helping businesses optimize their processes and develop data-driven strategies.

My enthusiasm for technology extends far beyond analytics—I’m fascinated by how emerging technologies can solve complex problems, and I’m always eager to learn and explore new advancements in the field. Whether through data analysis, machine learning, or innovative tech solutions, I’m excited to continue applying my skills to make a meaningful impact in the world of tech.
